name: Sanctus Cacas! Plants!
description:
"In the year 30,000, mankind has outlawed all forms of animal gambling...
In this time of galactic expansion, a bored scientist and their buddies have come up with a way to make terraforming planets into a game...
They root several flowers onto a planet, and wager which one will become most dominant over several months..." Sanctus Cacas! Plants! is an auto-battler where you and four AI plant seeds, and then gamble on which one will be most prosperous."

Sanctus Cacas! Plants! Is an auto-battler where you are both competing to make the largest flower batch, but also gambling over who's plant will be the most abundant.

Made in association with Global Game Jam (the theme was roots!)
(https://globalgamejam.org/2023/jam-sites/brisbane)
